title: Woody Allen's Next Movie Is Creepy, Military Class Warfare 10.24.17
itunes:title: Woody Allen's Next Movie Is Creepy, Military Class Warfare 10.24.17
description:
In episode 12, Jack & Miles are joined again by comedian Jamie Loftus to discuss financier Bill Browder, Tyler Perry & his Medea movies, classism in America & the military, & Jamie's podcast Bechdel Cast and her views on Woody Allen's Manhattan.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
